product_name: Eagle Creek Travel Bug Daypack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Eagle Creek Travel Bug daypack is perfectly sized to carry daily necessities on short trips. Zippered main compartment features Smart Travel Security(TM) organization, including an interior mobile phone and electronics pocket, zippered pocket, key fob and pen slot. Padded sleeve accommodates most tablets, netbooks and iPads. Zippered front pocket; top grab handle; padded shoulder straps; reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Travel Bug daypack is perfectly sized to carry daily necessities on short trips.
